exerciseButton.headline: Exercise Overview
exerciseButton.content: If you click on <tt>Exercise</tt> you will get an overview of all exercises of this course.

tutorCourseDashboardButton.headline: Tutor Course Dashboard
tutorCourseDashboardButton.content: If you navigate to the <tt>Tutor Course Dashboard</tt> you will be able to get an overview of several student submission and grade them.

overview.headline: Overview
overview.content: Here you can see an overview of your assessments, complaints and feedback requests.

showFinished.headline: Show Finished Exercises
showFinished.content: In order to see all exercises, just tick the checkbox <tt>Show finished exercises</tt>.

exerciseTable.headline: Exercise Table
exerciseTable.content: This table displays all exercises of this course.

gradingProcess.headline: Grading Process
gradingProcess.content: This graph visualizes your current grading process. You can hover over these nodes to find out more about the grading process steps after this tutorial.

exerciseDashboardButton.headline: Exercise Dashboard
exerciseDashboardButton.content: Let's head over to the exercise dashboard to view the exercise details and student submissions.

instructions.headline: Instructions
instructions.content: This section contains the <tt>Problem statement</tt>, <tt>Example solution</tt> and <tt>Grading instructions</tt> of the exercise. Please read through them carefully and then proceed to the next step.

instructionsButton.headline: Confirm instructions
instructionsButton.content: Click on this button and confirm only after you have read and understood the instructions.

reviewExampleSubmission.headline: Review Example Submission
reviewExampleSubmission.content: Click here to see how a submission could look like.

assessExampleSubmission.headline: Assess Example Submission
assessExampleSubmission.content: Click here to work on your first assessment.

submissionsAndComplaints.headline: Student submission
submissionsAndComplaints.content: The student submissions will be displayed here.

reviewSubmission.headline: Review Example Submission
reviewSubmission.content: This is an example submission where three text blocks are already marked for assessment.

reviewAssessment.headline: Review Example Assessment
reviewAssessment.content: This is an example assessment of the submission. Each text block is is graded with one score.

confirm.headline: Confirm
confirm.content: Confirm if you have read and understood the example.

addAssessment.headline: Assess Example Submission
addAssessment.content: Now you can start assessing this text exercise.
addAssessment.task: Mark the text of the three patterns and click on the <tt>Assess</tt> button.

addScore.headline: Add Score
addScore.content: Here you can add a score and additional feedback for each assessment element.
addScore.task: Add one score for each pattern.

submit.headline: Submit Assessment
submit.content: Now you can submit your assessment

back.headline: Complete Assessment Tour
back.content: Navigate back to the exercise dashboard to complete your tour.
